original_text: You shall father sons and daughters, but they shall not be yours, for they shall go into captivity.
korean_text: 네가 자녀를 낳을지라도 그들이 포로가 되므로 너와 함께 있지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: You shall father sons and daughters
but they shall not be yours
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너의 것이 되지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: for they shall go into captivity
